questions.question: Which security feature in WhatsApp requires a PIN when registering your phone number again, preventing unauthorized access?
questions.explanation: Two-step verification adds an extra layer of security by requiring a custom PIN when verifying your phone number.

questions.question: You want to pay a shopkeeper using Google Pay. What is the quickest way to do this if they have a printed code on their counter?
options: Ask for their bank account number
questions.explanation: Scanning the QR (Quick Response) code allows for instant payment without typing a mobile number or UPI ID.

questions.question: Which AI feature in WhatsApp allows you to chat with an intelligent assistant for information or image generation?
questions.explanation: Meta AI is the artificial intelligence assistant integrated into WhatsApp by its parent company, Meta.

questions.question: In a Google Meet call, what function serves as a digital whiteboard for collaboration?
questions.explanation: Jamboard is an interactive whiteboard tool that can be used within Google Meet for brainstorming and collaboration.

questions.question: What is the primary function of the 'Truecaller' app mentioned in the session?
questions.explanation: Truecaller helps identify unknown numbers and block unwanted spam calls.

questions.question: You are in a Zoom meeting and your room is messy. Which feature can you use to hide your surroundings?
questions.explanation: Virtual backgrounds or background blur replace or obscure your actual physical surroundings during a video call.

questions.question: Which AI tool mentioned is designed to transform text into music?
questions.explanation: Suno is an AI tool capable of generating music and songs based on text prompts.

questions.question: If you want to send a large video file (e.g., 1.5 GB) to a friend, which app is generally known for supporting larger file transfers efficiently?
questions.explanation: Telegram supports sharing files up to 2GB (or more with Premium), which is significantly higher than standard WhatsApp limits.

questions.question: What is 'Google Translate Conversation Mode' used for?
options: Real-time voice translation between two languages spoken by two people
questions.explanation: Conversation mode listens to both languages being spoken and translates them aloud in real-time, facilitating dialogue.

questions.question: Which feature in Telegram allows you to have a chat that is not stored on their servers and has a self-destruct timer?
questions.explanation: Secret Chats use end-to-end encryption and include self-destruct timers for maximum privacy.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'Photo Scan' app by Google Photos?
options: To digitize old printed photos without glare
questions.explanation: Photo Scan is designed to take high-quality digital scans of physical printed photos using your phone camera.

questions.question: Which app is recommended for organizing trips online?
questions.explanation: MakeMyTrip is a popular travel app for booking flights, hotels, and holiday packages.

questions.question: Which AI companion app is described as an 'AI-Powered Virtual Companion'?
questions.explanation: Replika is an AI chatbot designed to act as a personal companion or friend.

questions.question: In WhatsApp, how can you bookmark a message to find it easily later?
questions.explanation: Starring a message adds it to a 'Starred Messages' list for quick access.

questions.question: Which app is primarily used for booking cab rides?
questions.explanation: Ola Cabs is a ride-sharing platform used to book taxis and autos.

questions.question: What allows you to share a YouTube video starting from a specific moment (e.g., 2 minutes 30 seconds)?
options: You must cut the video yourself
Use the 'Start at' checkbox when clicking Share
questions.explanation: When sharing a YouTube link, you can check 'Start at [time]' to generate a link that opens directly to that timestamp.

questions.question: What is 'HealthifyMe' used for?
options: Comprehensive health, diet, and fitness tracking
questions.explanation: HealthifyMe is a health companion app for tracking calories, diet, and workouts.

questions.question: Which application is an 'All-in-One Workspace' for notes, tasks, and databases?
questions.explanation: Notion is a versatile productivity tool that combines notes, docs, project management, and wikis.

questions.question: To read eBooks or listen to audiobooks, which Amazon service/device is recommended?
questions.explanation: Kindle is Amazon's brand for e-readers and the associated app for reading eBooks.

questions.question: Brain.fm uses AI to generate music specifically for:
questions.explanation: Brain.fm uses functional music designed by AI to steer your mental state toward focus or relaxation.
